title: Shutdown Fullcast 7.24: We Were Right About Everything
description:
Or at least about Memphis beating UCLA! Don't bother fact-checking us on anything else, just assume we were right and move on from there.
Hey, did you know we're doing a charity drive for victims of Hurricanes Harvey and Irma? It's true! Just go to https://www.everydayshouldbesaturday.com/2017/9/14/16306480/shutdown-fullcast-7-23-lets-not-talk-about-tennessee-florida and you can find out the details, including how you can force us to read basically whatever you want us to on a future Fullcast episode.
